darwin-avoid-spinlock.description:
Description

Finds usages of
OSSpinlock
, which is deprecated due to potential livelock
problems.

This check will detect following function invocations:

OSSpinlockLock
OSSpinlockTry
OSSpinlockUnlock

The corresponding information about the problem of
OSSpinlock
:
https://blog.postmates.com/why-spinlocks-are-bad-on-ios-b69fc5221058
darwin-avoid-spinlock.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
